content:
Hi all! For anyone who has worked on a digital health project/product in Berlin-Brandenburg in the past or present (or is/was living there), I'd like to invite you to participate in a survey for my bachelor thesis! I hope it's alright to post this here, let me know if otherwise.

The survey topic is your awareness and experiences with innovation methodologies in digital health product creation. It is anonymous and takes roughly 15 minutes. https://afatykhova.eu.pythonanywhere.com/
